MockERC20.name: Soul Token
MockERC20.description: ERC20 payment token with ERC20Permit support. Initial supply: 1,000,000 SOUL minted to deployer.

SoulNFT.description: Soul NFT contract supporting create, fork, and lineage tracking.

Vault.description: Platform fee vault. Holds collected platform fees in SOUL token.

SoulSale.description: Marketplace contract for listing/buying Soul NFTs with royalty distribution and x402 support.

AgentRegistry.name: Soul Marketplace Agent
AgentRegistry.description: ERC-8004 compliant Identity Registry for AI Agents. Supports registration, wallet binding, and metadata management.

X402Facilitator.description: x402 protocol facilitator for EIP-712 signed payment settlement. Linked to SoulSale as authorized facilitator.
